description: Looking for articles written by Neal Taparia? Check out all of Neal Taparia's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogNeal Taparia Entrepreneur Neal Taparia Neal Taparia is a serial entrepreneur. He built Imagine Easy Solutions, an edtech company that reached 30M students annually. He sold the business to a public company called Chegg, where he was an executive for three years. He's now working on a new initiative, Unwind Media, which explores how classic games can be used for brain training.
